summary.span: 用于在文本容器中设置文本效果的帮助器类

span.span: A helper class that sets text effects in a text container

span.span: The effect to apply on the text

summary.span: 将文本范围的文本效果解析为文本效果目标的列表。

span.span: Resolves text effect on a text range to a list of text effect targets.

returns.span: 与文本范围对应的 对象的集合。

span.span: Collection of objects corresponding to the text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于每个连续的文本块，此方法创建的文本效果针对作用域的 （父） 元素。For each continuous block of text, this method creates a text effect targeting the scoping (parent) element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将应用， ，和为文本的文本效果。The following example shows how to apply a , , and text effect to text. 下面是示例 XAML。Below is the XAML for the example.
